experience.title: Software Engineer Intern
experience.description: • Implemented a scalable real-time push message system and WhatsApp Health Care chatbot application written in Python• Developed with Gupshup chat API, asycnio, concurrent library, ProgresSQL and flask which increased efficiency by 23%• Analyzed a business process and designed an efficient and scalable system for tracking materials in exterior fettling process• Innovated functional and database design, where 70% of goods are outsourced for exterior fettling, on figma and lucidchart

experience.title: React Developer
experience.description: • Worked in GALK Lab project, where I was working on GALK portal, where we were given spikes and tasks.• Several tasks included implementing AG-grid library to export Excel sheets, making a new student portal.• Several spikes included checking the back-end firebase and reducing latency for downloading images by 5%.

honors_and_awards.title: KVPY SA Stream Scholar
honors_and_awards.description: The Kishore Vaigyanik Protsahan Yojana (KVPY) is an on-going National Program of Fellowship in Basic Sciences, initiated and funded by the Department of Science and Technology, Government of India, to attract exceptionally highly motivated students for pursuing basic science courses and research career in science.

honors_and_awards.title: INMO Qualifier
honors_and_awards.description: The Indian National Mathematical Olympiad (INMO) is a high school mathematics competition held annually in India since 1989. It is the third tier in the Indian team selection procedure for the International Mathematical Olympiad and is conducted by the Homi Bhabha Centre for Science Education (HBCSE) under the aegis of the National Board of Higher Mathematics (NBHM).
